articles.description: Community Gaming CEO and 3XP conference organizer Chris Gonsalves believes crypto and tech could rejuvenate and reinvent the esports industry. In an interview, he tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin why he thinks esports organizations should shake up their approach.
articles.title: Esports Orgs Should Become More Like Tech Companies: Community Gaming CEO

articles.author: Mattis Meichler
articles.description: Despite the adoption of MiCA, ESMA said today firms must still label crypto offerings as unregulated until the framework is implemented.
articles.title: European Securities Regulator Raises Concerns Over Crypto Products Ahead of MiCA Rollout

articles.description: After landing a crypto operator's license in Thailand today, Binance Gulf is expected to open its doors at the end of this year.
articles.title: Binance Expects to Launch New Thai Crypto Exchange in Q4 2023

articles.description: The collapse of FTX, the rise in self-custody interest, and Ethereum’s latest upgrade appear to be fueling the latest exchange exodus.

articles.description: Amid increasing regulatory pressure in the U.S., the Winklevoss twins see the Emerald Isle as an “entry point” into the rest of Europe.

articles.description: Reddit released a limited quantity of free Rabbids avatar NFTs and users are scooping them up, with multiple varieties already depleted.
articles.title: Ubisoft's Rabbids Invade Reddit as Free NFTs

articles.title: Mojo Melee Game Preview: Hands-on With the Casual Web3 Auto Battler

articles.description: They used good old-fashioned digital editing tools instead.

articles.description: PREVIEW: The NFT-infused Mojo Melee is simple in its beta state, but that makes it a good introduction to a complex genre.
articles.title: Mojo Melee Puts a Casual Spin on Teamfight Tactics-Style Auto Battlers

articles.description: Microsoft President Brad Smith is the latest tech leader to call for government AI regulation, but says companies have a role too.
articles.title: Governments Need to 'Move Faster' on AI Rules, Says Microsoft President

articles.description: Multichain has issued 35% of Fantom's assets, including 80% of its total stablecoin market cap, according to research firm Thanefield Capital.
articles.title: Panic Over $1.5 Billion DeFi Bridge Multichain Shifts to Fantom

articles.description: The U.S. has never defaulted before. Interestingly, Bitcoin and Ethereum have seen more losses than stocks after a warning from Janet Yellen.

articles.description: The number of Bitcoin Ordinals—which includes NFTs and meme tokens—continues to surge, with supporters calling it a catalyst for adoption.

articles.title: Illuvium Overworld Blends Open World Adventure With Pokémon-Style Battling—And It's Beautiful

articles.description: For its artificial intelligence speech tool, Meta is processing over 4,000 languages with the aim of preservation.
articles.title: Meta Is Training Its AI on the Bible and Other Religious Texts

articles.title: Tornado Cash Developer Can Question Chainalysis at Trial, Says Judge

articles.title: Shaq Hit With Lawsuits Over Solana NFT Project, FTX During NBA Game

articles.description: Less than two weeks after being granted bail and released to house arrest, Bloomberg reports that Kwon is back in custody.
articles.title: Terra Founder Do Kwon Back in Jail in Montenegro, Bail Revoked

articles.author: Mattis Meichler
articles.description: At the Festival de Cannes, independent filmmakers shared their ambitions to use Web3 technology to revolutionize cinema.
articles.title: MetaCannes: How Web3 Filmmakers Are Leading ‘Next Wave’ of Cinema

articles.description: Community Gaming CEO and 3XP organizer Chris Gonsalves tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the first 3XP video game conference, which aims to bring together fans of crypto-enabled video games, influencers, game developers, blockchain firms, and gamers under one roof in Pasadena, California from June 8-9, 2023.
articles.title: How 3XP Plans to Reshape Crypto's Reputation Among Gamers

articles.description: What is Azra Games' approach to NFTs in gaming? Azra Games CEO Mark Otero shares his vision and why he believes his approach was a key reason Azra received investment from venture capital firms like Andreessen Horowitz (a16z).
articles.title: Mark Otero Shares Why a16z Invested in Azra Games' Approach to Gaming

articles.description: Spanish Film Director Miguel Faus talks with Decrypt about how he financed his movie “Calladita” with NFTs. In his view, Web3 and blockchain allow creators to get around some of the key difficulties present in the traditional movie industry, specifically finding funding.
articles.title: Funding Web3 Film Calladita With Traditional Systems 'Wasn't Working', Says Director Miguel Faus

articles.description: Film3 pioneer, Metacannes and The Squad founder, Jordan Bayne discusses the advantages that crypto offers to filmmakers, notably owning their work's IP throughout the entire creation, production, and distribution processes.
articles.title: 'Web3 Offers Something Hollywood Does Not': Film3 Pioneer, Filmmaker Jordan Bayne

articles.description: First Flights co-founder Nick Sadler sat down with Decrypt at this year's MetaCannes festival to discuss how Web3 can support independent filmmakers by leveraging its unique blockchain-powered crowdfunding platform.
articles.title: Film3 Offers 'a Whole Bunch of Independent Filmmakers' Hope, Says First Flights Co-founder Nick Sadler

articles.description: Founder and CEO of Bingeable Stephen Murray unpacks how creators and filmmakers can lower the barriers for audiences to connect with their work. "Within two clicks on hearing about the movie, you're watching it," he told Decrypt at this year's MetaCannes festival.
articles.title: The Film3 Movement 'Doesn't Need Competitors, it Needs Collaborators': Bingeable CEO, Founder Stephen Murray

articles.description: In this video, part of Infura’s Web3 Dev Series, you’ll learn how to define the web3 stack in order to build full stack decentralized applications. Author: Clarissa Watson, Senior Writer at ConsenSys.
articles.title: Decrypt Learn: Defining The Web3 Stack

articles.description: MyCo’s streaming platform CCO Phil McKenzie talks with Decrypt about the Film3 movement and the Metacannes festival he helped to organize occurring alongside the Festival de Cannes. He explains how Web3 can help creators to find funding and create new ways to interact with the audience.
articles.title: 'Web3 Creates a Tighter Bond' Between Audiences, Creators: MyCo CCO

articles.description: Immutable VP and Gods Unchained Game Director Chris Clay tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how Immutable is actually immutable—and how that changes everything for both developers and players.
articles.title: Immutable's Chris Clay: Crypto Can Solve the 'Dreaded Rollback' in MMORPGs

articles.description: During VeeCon 2023, entrepreneur spoke with Decrypt's Andrew Hayward about the rise of AI tools, what excites him about the technology, and what kind of impact he thinks it will have on creators and business.
articles.title: Gary Vee Discusses the Rise and Impact of AI

articles.description: VeeCon is back in 2023, moving from Minneapolis to Indianapolis, and creator and entrepreneur Gary Vaynerchuk joined Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to discuss his aim to make it the "coolest business conference in the world." And that means expanding the focus beyond NFTs and Web3 to include AI and other tech innovations, along with broader business and pop culture content.
articles.title: Gary Vee Discusses VeeCon 2023's Broader Shift Beyond Web3

articles.description: Gary Vaynerchuk called the NFT market decline back in 2021, but the owner of CryptoPunks and other valuable tokenized assets still believes that a sustainable market will eventually form. He joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward amid VeeCon 2023 to discuss why he thinks the NFT space will be comparable to collectible sports cards, art, and even stuffed animals.
articles.title: Gary Vee on the NFT Market and Why 'NFTs Are Stuffed Animals'

articles.description: Immutable VP & Gods Unchained Game Director Chris Clay tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about what it's like to work in the game industry for decades and why he's not giving up on NFT games.
articles.title: What Immutable's Chris Clay Learned in 23 Years of Game Development

articles.description: "Each game is a miracle," says Azra Games CEO Mark Otero. In this clip, he shares his thoughts on "play-to-earn" games and gamer motivation with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.
articles.title: Why Azra Games CEO Mark Otero is Not a Fan of "Play-to-Earn" Games

articles.description: Solana Games General Manager Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the current state of Solana's Web3 gaming ecosystem.
articles.title: How Many Games Are Building On Solana? The Answer Might Surprise You

articles.description: InfiniGods Cofounders Owen O'Donoghue and Damon Gura keep it real with Decrypt's Kate Irwin, sharing thoughts on game balancing and what to do when in-game assets become NFTs.
articles.title: Problems With Being an 'On-Chain Purist'  in Gaming

articles.description: Solana Foundation's Games General Manager Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about Solana's "build together" approach as well as his thoughts on crypto firms becoming game publishers.
articles.title: Why Solana Won't Become A Web3 Game Publisher

articles.description: Hedera VP Alex Russman tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about Hedera's Web3 gaming ecosystem and shares a game he's particularly excited about.
articles.title: The State Of Web3 Gaming On Hedera
